thread.title: Patricia
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text: I always get a responsible, respectful, knowledgeable, friendly, helpful customer service representative on the phone when I call and never feel I'm intruding on their time for someone else, nor do I feel belittled for any reason for not already having the answers I am requiring about.
